title: A 60-Year Misunderstanding: Language Adapts to the Brain, Not the Other Way Around
titleZh: 一个被搞反了60年的真相：不是大脑天生会语言，而是语言在拼命适应大脑
excerpt: For decades, Chomsky's theory of Universal Grammar dominated linguistics. But new research suggests a different truth: Language is not an innate biological module, but a cultural system that evolves to fit our cognitive constraints.
excerptZh: 几十年来，乔姆斯基的普遍语法理论主导了语言学界。但新的研究揭示了一个不同的真相：语言并非天生的生物模块，而是一个不断演化以适应我们认知限制的文化系统。

title: Personal AI vs. Public AI: The Real Paradigm Shift (Insights from CES 2026)
titleZh: 个人 AI vs 公共 AI：真正的范式转移（CES 2026 洞察）
excerpt: Is your AI a public bus or a private car? At CES 2026, the discussion shifted from 'what models can do' to 'who the AI represents'. A deep dive into the downstreaming of AI to terminals, memory management, and the rise of Agent as a Service.
excerptZh: 你的 AI 是公交车还是私家车？在 CES 2026 上，讨论的焦点从“模型能做什么”转向了“AI 代表谁”。深入探讨 AI 向终端下沉、记忆管理以及 Agent 即服务（AaaS）的兴起。

title: Cursor vs. Anthropic: Two Divergent Paths to Long-running Agents
titleZh: Cursor vs. Anthropic：Long-running Agents 的两种演进思路
excerpt: How to move Agents from 'one-off tasks' to 'complex long-running projects'? Cursor and Anthropic recently shared their engineering practices, offering two distinct yet complementary solutions: massive parallelism vs. memory continuity.

title: Anil Seth: Your AI Consciousness Experience Might Just Be a "Müller-Lyer Illusion"
titleZh: Anil Seth: 你的 AI 意识体验，或许只是一场“缪勒-莱尔错觉”
excerpt: When we see "consciousness" in AI, are we really seeing it? Renowned neuroscientist Anil Seth argues in a deep dive that equating intelligence with consciousness is a fundamental cognitive bias. Simulation is not instantiation; life itself might be the bedrock of consciousness. Let's not underestimate ourselves by overestimating machines.
excerptZh: 当我们在 AI 身上看到“意识”时，我们真的看到了吗？知名神经科学家 Anil Seth 在万字长文中犀利指出：我们将智能等同于意识是根本性的认知偏差。模拟不等于例示，生命本身或许才是意识的基石。不要因为高估了机器，而低估了我们自己。

title: Living in Manus' Shadow After Killing the PM? The Survival Guide for Lovart and AI Application Layer

This article deeply analyzes how Lovart sprinted along the path blazed by Manus, the double-edged sword of its radical 'No PM' philosophy, and the ultimate breakout battle for application-layer entrepreneurs in the shadow of giants.
